title: Is the Establishment Taking it Too Easy on the Donald?
description:
How did we get here?  How did we get to the Secretary of State calling the president a moron and the Republican Head of the Senate Foreign Relations Committee saying he needed adult supervision and had us possibly heading for World War III?  Certainly Donald Trump had something to do with it?  But what about the rest of us?  Despite his whining is the media actually going too easy on him?  What about the political establishment?   In this episode big time establishment types like Kori Schake of Stanford, David Sanger of the New York Times and Edward Luce of the Financial Times discuss...and make it all clear.  Tune in.Support this show http://supporter.acast.com/deepstateradio.
